summary: BuildRequest contains no explicit requirements; diff modifies backend/main.mo and project_state.json. The diff introduces an AnalyticsEvent type in the backend data model, which appears to be new functionality not requested by this build trigger.

hallucinated_features.description: Added an analytics data model type (AnalyticsEvent) described as "Added for analytics first field iteration".
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly lists no requirements and states a non-goal to avoid adding new product features beyond what is already implemented; the diff suggests adding analytics-related structure.
